propertyTaxCriteria.name: AssessedValue
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The assessed value of the property for tax purposes as provided by the county assessor

propertyTaxCriteria.name: YearAssessed
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The year the property was last assessed for tax purposes

propertyTaxCriteria.name: TaxesPerYear
propertyTaxCriteria.description: Annual property taxes based on the current assessed value and tax rate

propertyTaxCriteria.name: EstimatedTaxRate
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The annual property taxes as a percentage of the total assessed value of the property

propertyTaxCriteria.name: HomeownerTaxExemption
propertyTaxCriteria.description: Whether the owner claimed the property as primary residence for tax exemption purposes

propertyTaxCriteria.name: TaxRateArea
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The tax rate area the property is located in as provided by the county assessor's office

propertyTaxCriteria.name: PropertyTaxDelinquent
propertyTaxCriteria.description: Whether the property had delinquent property taxes as of the last tax status update

propertyTaxCriteria.name: YearsPropertyTaxDelinquent
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The number of years the property taxes have been delinquent

propertyTaxCriteria.name: PropertyTaxDelinquentAmount
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The estimated amount of property taxes delinquent as of the last tax status update

propertyTaxCriteria.name: PropertyTaxDelinquentSince
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The year when the property taxes first became delinquent

propertyTaxCriteria.name: NumberOfMissedTaxPayments
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The number of missed property tax payments

propertyTaxCriteria.name: AssessedToEstimatedValueRatio
propertyTaxCriteria.description: The ratio of assessed value to estimated market value (percentage)

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range Including Unknowns: Same as Multiple Range but also includes properties with unknown values
